Texts.Chs: 经历了一场场如同炼狱般的战斗，现在是时候获得我的奖赏了！
Texts.Eng: Now that was one hell of a brawl! Time to claim my hard-earned loot!
Survive all waves in the Grand Arena without dying.

Texts.Chs: 这张地图指出了通往叶族猎人为了测试实力而修建的竞技场的路。
Texts.Eng: The map shows me the way to a grand jungle arena where floran hunters go test their strength. There's a prize advertised for those who manage to survive...
